title: Negate!

meta.alt_txt: nullify the next common/special card of that category to be played by them
meta.double_alt_txt: nullify the next {!e card_get_meta_num {fusion} ne_amt} common/special cards of that type to be played by them
meta.ext_txt: Any time a card is nullified, there will be an announcement that it happened, but it won't say the player or category it happened to.

desc:
[Ne]

Target another player and choose a card category. The next common/special card of that category played by them will be nullified.

-# Any time a card is nullified, there will be an announcement that it happened, but it won't say the player or category it happened to.
